title: JAM - SNAP TALK
description: You have one minute to speak your piece, and everything will be determined within seconds. Energize yourselves, speak up without hesitation, and win with your words and tenacity.
registration: Registration is to be done online and this event comes under general registration.
rules: Usage of offensive and vulgar words should be avoided.
Usage of filler words should be avoided.
The topic will be given on spot.
Repetitive words or ideas are not encouraged.
Participants must adhere to the general rules that will be set by the judges.
